name: CalorieCounterwithExerciseSuggestions
0:
”Alexa, open Calorie Counter”
”Alexa, ask Calorie Counter about hamburger and fries”
”Alexa, ask Calorie Counter about rice egg and juice”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: calorie counter
des:
There are many calorie counter skills out there but the difference of this skill is it also suggests you what exercises or activities you can do and for how much time to burn the calories.

To launch this skill, you can say:

"Alexa, open Calorie Counter"
"Alexa, ask Calorie Counter about <food, dessert or drink>." (one-shot invocation)

You can say any food, dessert or drink when prompted:

"Hamburger and fries"
"2 slices of pizza"
"1 large scrambled egg"
"1 pint of ice cream"
"2 cups of rice"
"1 can of Coke"
"1 stack of IHOP pancakes"

Note that some branded products may not be available.

Disclaimer:
The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.

API Attribution:
Data for calorie and exercise lookup is powered by Nutritionix.

Icon Attributions:
- Calculator and Apple icons made by wanicon (https://www.flaticon.com/authors/wanicon) from flaticon.com
- Bicep icon made by monkik (https://www.flaticon.com/authors/monkik) from flaticon.com
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
